summary: This document outlines the restrictions on the operational use of individuals or groups by the DDO, covering various categories such as members of ACTION, Fulbright grantees, and employees of other U.S. government agencies. It details the required approvals and concurrences for operational use based on the individual's affiliation or status.
title: DDO INSTRUCTION NO. 50-10: RESTRICTIONS ON OPERATIONAL USE
sender: William E. Nelson, Deputy Director for Operations
